name: What We Had To Do
description:
It was a simple job. None of us wanted to do it. Someone had to. It hurt, yes. But it is the only way we can keep them out. Don't let anyone tell you otherwise.

 A short, low-res, first person point & click thriller created for Scream Jam 2021.

There are no jumpscares, though the game's general audio mix leans on the loud side.

Estimated playtime: 5-10 minutes.
